attachments.title: AWS | Amazon Elastic Transcoder - Media & Video Transcoding in the Cloud
attachments.text: Media transcoding in the cloud: Amazon Elastic Transcoder gives developers an easy, cost-effective way to convert media files to playback on various devices.

text: added some quick notes to the existing doc to reflect what we talked about this a.m. didn’t want to go too in depth as we’re moving pretty quickly on this one. i think one of key points will be keeping track of infrastructure costs <@U1S5GKTHQ> so we can clearly communicate to wildfang what those will be when we meet next
We used Zencoder back in the day for a product. They were acquired by BrightCove.
And for AWS - I can ping their CTO to see if we could get credits donated for server costs. (We got free hosting for Safecast back in the day.)
Not sure why I’m saying back in the day so much.
